comp1721.cwk2

类 Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • comp1721.cwk2.Card
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.lang.Comparable<Card>

    public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Card>
    Representation of a playing card.

    Provided for use in COMP1721 Coursework 2.

    • 嵌套类概要

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Card

        public Card(Card.Rank r,
            Card.Suit s)
        Creates a Card object.
        参数:
        r - Rank of the card
        s - Suit of the card

      • Card

        public Card(java.lang.String name)
        Creates a Card object, given its name as a string.

        Name can either be given in full - e.g., "Ace of Clubs" - or be abbreviated to a two-character code - e.g., "AC".

        参数:
        name - Name of card
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if string is invalid

    • 方法详细资料

      • useFancySymbols

        public static void useFancySymbols(boolean fancy)
        Enables or disables use of fancy Unicode symbols for suits.
        参数:
        fancy - True if fancy symbols are required, false otherwise

      • getRank

        public Card.Rank getRank()
        Provides the rank of this card.
        返回:
        The rank

      • getSuit

        public Card.Suit getSuit()
        Provides the suit of this card.
        返回:
        The suit

      • hashCode

        public int hashCode()
        Computes the hash code for this card.
        覆盖:
        hashCode 在类中 java.lang.Object
        返回:
        Hash code

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object thing)
        Tests whether this card is equal to another object.
        覆盖:
        equals 在类中 java.lang.Object
        参数:
        thing - Object with which this card is being compared
        返回:
        true if thing is equal to this card, false otherwise

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Creates a two-character string representation of this card.

        The first character represents rank, the second represents suit. Special Unicode symbols will be used for the latter if Card.fancySymbols is set to true.

        覆盖:
        toString 在类中 java.lang.Object
        返回:
        String representation of this card

      • fullName

        public java.lang.String fullName()
        Generates this card's full name - e.g., "Ace of Spades".
        返回:
        Full name of this card, as a string

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo(Card other)
        Compares this card to another, using their natural ordering (by suit, then by rank).
        指定者:
        compareTo 在接口中 java.lang.Comparable<Card>
        返回:
        A negative integer if this card comes before the other, 0 if they are the same, a positive integer if this card comes after

      • value

        public int value()
        Computes the value of this card.

        Value is based on rank and disregards suit. Aces score 1 and picture cards all score 10.

        返回:
        Card value
